body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Modeling v2.0
  • Network Modeling v2.0 has been released with the following new features:
    • Add flexible steps to create a formula for your network model
    • Ability to clone a network model
    • Ability to reset a virtual network
  • For more information, please contact Sales.Analytics@Zelis.com.
  • NOTE: The Network Modeling functionality will not be configured until coordinated.
Comprehensive Recruiting List
  • A 'recruiting' tab has been added to CompAccess that contains a comprehensive list of all providers not in the Base Network for the entire census file:
    • This list can be used to target providers who help fill gaps where member access is less than the specified standard and is exportable
    • Unlike the recruiting list found in the Gap Map, the comprehensive Recruiting list gives you a complete view of potential targets for the entire analysis
  • NOTE: While we work to improve performance on this new feature, please retry your search with more refined search criteria if you experience slow response times.

Updates

  • Network Modeling now allows for bulk pasting of zip codes
  • Competitive Dashboard:
    • Networks that have 0 hospitals and 0 providers are now hidden in results
    • Networks that have no hospitals no longer appear in Top Hospitals
  • As we begin to rebrand to Zelis, we are removing Strenuus references from Network360:
    • Contacts will now direct users to Zelis email accounts
    • Export PDFs have been updated with the Zelis logo
    • Specialty Mappings have been updated accordingly:
      • Strenuus Behavioral Health = Standard Behavioral Health
      • Strenuus Dental Standard = Standard Dental
      • Strenuus Medical Standard = Standard Medical
      • Strenuus Medical Standard with Facilities = Standard Medical with Facilities
      • Strenuus Medicare = Standard Medicare
      • Strenuus Network Modeling Standard = Standard Network Modeling
      • Strenuus Provider Network Development = Standard Provider Network Development
      • Strenuus Vision = Standard Vision
